name: Fire Squad
description:
Fire Squad is a 3D puzzle game targeted towards casual players where the player alternates between 3 characters with different abilities and weaknesses to use in order to rescue the civilians on time. Players test their decision making skills against the clock in order to complete the level as fast as possible and get the highscore.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Get to know us

Mobii Games was founded in 2021 by 8 Game Development students from UOWMKDU for the module “Game Project Studio 2” and to mimic the semi-reality of an indie studio. The team aimed to further learn the know-how of developing games in a small-scale team while also running the studio. With a project timeline of 3 months, the studio’s game “Fire Squad” is finally due for release in August 2021.
